bib_record.title: On the mechanism of the reactions 24,25,26Mg(n,a)21,22,23Ne at neutron energies near 14.1 MeV

free_txt: sections and graphs of angular distributions.
Data is corrected for background and for alpha
energy loss in the magnesium targets.
2 methane filled proportional counters and a surface
barrier silicon detector. Triple coincidence required.
Absolute cross sections are also subject
to a common systematic error from neutron monitor
calibration of less than ten percent.
A low mass tritium target was used to minimise
background. Magnesium targets were positioned at 10
different angles and 6 deuteron energies from 0.40
with a stilbene proton recoil scintillation
Tables and graphs in Z.Physik, A285(1978)293.
